steps.name: Close cookie consent
steps.selector: button:has-text('Do not show this message again')

steps.name: Password
steps.selector: body > identity > div > div:nth-child(3) > login > div > div > div > harmony-credential > div.login-section_form_input > form > div > password-input > div > input

pages.comment: Jitterbit Harmony landing page, hover on App Builder to show tile label
pages.title: harmony

operations.comment: Snap with and without Jitterbit menu
operations.name: tile

steps.name: hover to open app controls
steps.selector: #wrapper > div > div > div > div > div > div > div:nth-child(2)

steps.name: menu
steps.selector: #wrapper > div > div > div > div.row.clearfix.ng-scope > div.menu.app-menu2 > ng-include > ul.setup-nav.scroll-style-6.ng-scope > li.active.sub-open

steps.name: save new module
steps.selector: body > div.modal.setup-modal.modal-600.ng-scope.top.am-fade-and-slide-right > form > div.modal-header > div > div > ul > li:nth-child(2) > button

viewport.comment: minimum size to see all fields and labels without truncating

steps.name: modules new-module fields
steps.selector: #wrapper > div > div > div > div.row.clearfix.ng-scope > div.content-in2 > div > div.row.module-designer.ng-scope > div.col-sm-3.template-field.all-fields

viewport.comment: minimum size to see all fields and labels without truncating

steps.name: cancel create section
steps.selector: body > div.modal.setup-modal.modal-600.ng-scope.top.am-fade-and-slide-right > form > div.modal-header > div > div > ul > li:nth-child(1) > button

steps.name: save new module
steps.comment: canceling invokes browser's popup which is impossible to interact with

steps.name: menu
steps.selector: #wrapper > div > div > div > div.row.clearfix.ng-scope > div.menu.app-menu2 > ng-include > ul.setup-nav.scroll-style-6.ng-scope > li.active.sub-open

steps.name: enter name
steps.selector: #MicroflowEditorController > div.modal-dialog.scroll-style-4 > div > form > div.panel > div.form-group.relative > input

steps.name: open module list
steps.selector: #MicroflowEditorController > div.modal-dialog.scroll-style-4 > div > form > div:nth-child(2) > div > div > select

steps.name: enter record
steps.selector: #MicroflowEditorController > div.modal-dialog.scroll-style-4 > div > form > div:nth-child(2) > div.form-group.ng-scope > input

steps.name: select record operation
steps.selector: #MicroflowEditorController > div.modal-dialog.scroll-style-4 > div > form > div:nth-child(3) > div:nth-child(1) > tags-input

steps.name: enter UI Flow name
steps.selector: #UIflowEditorController > div.modal-dialog.scroll-style-4 > div > form > div.panel > div.form-group.relative > input

steps.name: open view list
steps.selector: #UIflowEditorController > div.modal-dialog.scroll-style-4 > div > form > div.panel > div:nth-child(5) > div > select

steps.name: open event list
steps.selector: #UIflowEditorController > div.modal-dialog.scroll-style-4 > div > form > div.panel > div.form-group.ng-scope > div > select

steps.name: menu
steps.selector: #wrapper > div > div > div > div.row.clearfix.ng-scope > div.menu.app-menu2 > ng-include > ul.setup-nav.scroll-style-6.ng-scope > li.active.sub-open

steps.name: blur
steps.content: #wrapper > div > div > div > div.row.clearfix.ng-scope > div.content-in2 > div > div.tab-content.branding.ng-scope > div > div > div > div.custom-domain.ng-scope.tab-pane.am-fade.active > div > div > div > div.host-block > span.bold.ng-binding { filter: blur(5px); }

steps.name: wait for email templates to load
wait for new email template to open
menu

steps.name: wait for 'create new package!' to open
hover to open pane
steps.selector: #wrapper > div > div > div > div > div > div > div:nth-child(2)

steps.name: select settings
steps.selector: #wrapper > div > div > div > div > div > div > div:nth-child(2) > div > div.more-info > div.secondbox > div > div > span > i
